name: Dicey Elementalist
description:
Inspired by a popular dice game called Yahtzee.
- Five dice are rolled three times, keep the best score.
On this basis.
Add some deck building
Add some random variables (Rogue-lite)
Add some unique heroes
Add some different game mechanics
And...Here it comes! The Dice Master!
THE RULE IS SIMPLE
Light up the elements of a card required to play, bingo!
If you can't light the card, the card will be unusable = useless!
So
Be sure to build your deck reasonably well with your "brilliant strategic"!
